sentences.en: He did his best to pull himself together and look unconcerned.
sentences.cn: 他竭力振作精神,做出满不在乎的模样.

sentences.en: He drove on, apparently unconcerned about the noise the engine was making.
sentences.cn: 他继续驾车前进，对发动机发出的噪声显然毫不在意。

sentences.en: He is unconcerned about personal appearance.
He seems totally unconcerned by real dangers.
sentences.cn: 他对于真实的危险似乎全然不在乎。

sentences.en: He was unconcerned in the affair.
His report was unconcerned with the affair.
sentences.cn: 他的报告与该事件无关.
我尽量表现得无动于衷.

sentences.en: Mond was unconcerned in the conspiracy.
Paul was unconcerned about what he had done.
sentences.cn: 保罗对自己的所作所为毫不在意。

sentences.en: She must look and be her prettiest and most unconcerned self.
sentences.cn: 她一定要在他们面前显露出她最漂亮最大方的本相.

sentences.en: The report is unconcerned with details.
Their manager is unconcerned at the laddish image and the drinking that goes with it.
sentences.cn: 经纪人对他们年轻放浪的形象和相伴而来的恣意纵酒的行为毫不担心。

sentences.en: They appeared completely unconcerned about what they had done.
sentences.cn: 看来他们完全不在乎自己的所作所为.

sentences.en: Tom seems quite unconcerned about his own future.
sentences.cn: 汤姆似乎对自己的前途抱无所谓的态度.

sentences.en: What had happened to Luca Brasi that Sollozzo was so unconcerned?
sentences.cn: 路加-布拉西怎么样了?为什么索洛佐对他满不在乎?

trans.tran_cn: 不感兴趣的，不相干的，无关的
trans.tran_en: not worried about something because you think it does not affect you
